mission_statement.0: We adhere to the principle of developing a working diagnosis, both accurate and truthful for each dental procedure.

mission_statement.1: We strive to develop our own skills to a point that treatment can be individualized.

mission_statement.2: We present a list of options to each patient in lieu of a pre-set treatment plan.

mission_statement.3: We expect each team member to deliver patient care to the utmost of their ability, with regularly consistent successful results with emphasis on quality in lieu of quantity.

mission_statement.4: We appreciate learning to be continual and to be a shared expression of genuine concern for the mutual development of skills.

mission_statement.5: We take the position that we are a teaching institution; concentrating on but not limited to the development of dental assistants and others who wish to make dentistry their career choice.

mission_statement.6: It is my desire to develop and maintain a team of dental professionals who wish to serve a higher calling by lending their talents to a team effort under these mission statements.
